statements: DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';

DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND order_date < '2022-01-01'

DELETE FROM ShippingPattern WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM ShippingPattern WHERE customer_id = 2002);
